translations: adv．顽皮地，恶作剧地：以一种顽皮或恶作剧的方式行事。
他顽皮地把她的钥匙藏起来了。

sentences.sentence: At event after event to introduce new Apple products, Mr. Jobs often puckishly proclaimed 'There is one more thing' before revealing the most significant news at the very end of a speech.
sentences.translation: 在一场场发布苹果新产品的活动中，乔布斯经常在讲话快结束时，恶作剧式地宣称“还有一件事”，然后才公布最重要的消息。
